alert.note: Alert for Washington (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 9:42AM PST until December 28 at 8:32PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tualatin River near Dilley. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...Above 17.5 feet, several minor roads begin to flood and may be closed. Widespread lowland agricultural flooding occurs at this and higher stages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage around 2 pm today to a crest of 17.6 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage around noon Wednesday. - Flood stage is 17.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/portland. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 4 PM PST.
